recipesJson.name: Early Autumn Pipe
recipesJson.author: ChemicalBurnVictim
recipesJson.description:
A caramel apple pie pipe tobacco. Has a nice kick to it. The kind of tobacco recipe that is well suited for sitting on porch in late September to unwind from the day. 

Full notes [here](https://reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/d8mm0g/sweet_and_smokey_seasonal_recipes/)
